sentences.sentence: These entities, even while occupying a body, could transmute matter.
sentences.translation: 这些实体，即使在占用身体时，也能改变物质。

sentences.sentence: That is all you need for your protection, as it will deflect or transmute the dark energies.
sentences.translation: 那是你最大的保护力，因为它可以“转移”或者“改变”黑暗的能量。

sentences.sentence: It will in time transmute or disintegrate, as a point will be reached when it cannot remain any longer.
sentences.translation: 它将适时转化或者瓦解，随着它无法再保持下去的时候，将达到一个临界点。
